title: Satake isomorphism
summary: In mathematics, the Satake isomorphism, introduced by Ichirō Satake (1963), identifies the Hecke algebra of a reductive group over a local field with a ring of invariants of the Weyl group.  The geometric Satake equivalence is a geometric version of the Satake isomorphism, proved by Ivan Mirković and Kari Vilonen (2007).
